features: 1.96H Playback & Dual LED Display. Each wireless earbud can last 8 hours of music time on a charge,you will get 96 hours of continuous playback with the charging case via using in turn. Our bluetooth earbuds ensure you can listen all day long.The charging case with LED power displays allow you to easily track the power levels of the case (1% -100%)and wireless earbuds (Its indicator light flashes when charging and turns off when fully charged.). The case supports USB-C wired fast charging.

2.Hifi Music & Clear Call. Indulge in pristine audio quality and HD voice technology with our bluetooth headphones. The sports wireless earbuds feature adopt especially designed 13mm large speakers, delivering sound that resonates with depth. These bluetooth wireless earphones keep the sound crisp and balanced with deep bass, delivering a big surround sound and maximizes the soundstage. Besides, built-in good microphones enhance your voice, make you sound clear and loud during phone calls.

3.Designed for Sports & IP7 Waterproof. The true wireless earbuds feature flexible and secure-fit ear hooks and come with 3 sizes of ear tips (S, M, L) for a perfect fit that remains snug and comfortable . With T9 headphones wireless bluetooth, you won't be worry of them falling out while you're on the go. Additionally,the Bluetooth earbuds are designed to be reliable shield against water droplets and sweat,ensuring they stand up to the rigors of intense activities during workouts, runs and gym.

4.Bluetooth 5.3 & Seamless One-Step Pairing.The Bluetooth earbuds with microphone offer an effortless pairing experience. Once initially connected, they automatically power on and connect to your device the moment they're removed from the charging case. Thanks to the Bluetooth 5.3 technology, you'll get fast and stable connection. The wireless earbuds with earhooks boast universal compatibility with a wide array of devices, including iOS and Android smartphones, TVs, computers, laptops, and etc.

5.Physical Button Controls & One Button Reset. Each over-ear earbud has complete functions for music and phone calls as well as voice assistant.This level of control puts your audio experience right at your fingertips. Additionally, we've simplified the reset process for your convenience. Inside the charging case, you'll find a reset button. Just press and hold the reset button for 5 seconds when the wireless ear buds in charging case, your in-ear earphones will be restored to factory settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I was very impressed with the look and design of the case and the earbuds. The white case with silver around the outer edge looks really nice.Upon opening the case, I was pleasantly surprised to find the earbuds were charged and ready for use! Definitely a bonus to not have to wait to charge before the first use!I am also very pleased with the feel of the earbuds. They fit my ear perfectly. These earbuds are light weight enough that I almost don’t even notice I am wearing them. I am someone who is very active, and I love to listen to music or a podcast while walking, running, gardening, and working. I typically use earbuds that wrap around my ear because I feel they typically stay in place better. After comparing many different earbuds and researching for a long time, I decided to give these a try. I am so happy I did! They have stayed perfectly in place while walking the dog, bending down to pull weeds in the garden, running, and many more activities. Over all, I would give these ear buds an A+ for comfort and for staying in place, which is of utmost importance for me!As far as usage, pairing was a breeze. Literally within seconds of opening the package, I had them paired with my phone. I often like to use only one earbuds while working, so I am able to hear when someone is talking to me, but also have music or a podcast going. I have used these with both the right and the left ear at once, and with just one ear in. Either way has worked smoothly and the transition between using one ear to using two ears is smooth, as well. I like that there is a C style charging cable included. I have so many other devices that use a c style cable, so it’s convenient to be able to plug in and charge almost any where in my house or car.As far the sound quality, everything sounds good to me! I haven’t had any troubles with sound quality whether I’m listening to music, watching a tv show or movie, or listening to a podcast. As far as I’m concerned, the sounds quality is perfect.Another quality that is really important to me when purchasing ear buds is the distance they with transmit ( forgive me if that isn’t the correct term…I’m not very techy). I don’t like to always carry my phone with me around the house or office, so I love if I can be a long way from my phone and not get disconnected or have the sounds get crackly. I noticed I could really walk all around my house and even outside without having any troubles. I decided to try a little experiment outside and see how far I could get from my phone without disconnecting or crackling. I was absolutely shocked to learn that I could walk a full two hundred and seventy feet away from my phone before I even heard the slightest bit of crackling! Considering I couldn’t even walk from one room to the next in my house with me old ear buds, I feel like that is a truly impressive distance!Overall, I am super happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Occiam wireless ear buds purchased November 2023
reviews.reviewText: These ear buds are amazing! Great quality, super easy pairing set up, flawless charging in case and incredible deep rich sound of music and conversations. Plenty of volume when needed too. Very comfortable to wear and overall an incredible value for a low price. These ear buds perform as good or better than others I've had that cost three times more. Definitely pick these up you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a good value for money
reviews.reviewText: So after an unfortunate incident involving my AirPods, I decided to go on the hunt for a budget friendly pair of headphones/earbuds. I happened to stumble across these and with a coupon was able to snag the beige pair for under $20. They were quick to arrive and were easy to pair with my phone. The headphones are so comfortable in my ears. Both the pieces that go in your ear, as well as the piece that wraps around the back of your ear are so comfortable! I didn't and have yet to get a headache from them and I wear them daily while doing house chores. They are more noise cancelling than my AirPods which is nice for most people but is a little hard when I am wearing only one so I can hear my small children. I love that it informs you of an incoming call and I love the color of them. The case is nice and the feature showing the battery life has been nice as well. Also....the battery life on these is SO GOOD. They have been lasting me forever even after using them for over 2 weeks, and everyday for hours sometimes I still have 45 percent battery life in the case portion. My AirPods would have needed to be charged way before this. Overall I am in love with these and would purchase again in a heart beat, as well as recommend this product to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good product given the price.
reviews.reviewText: These are my 2nd pair of wireless Bluetooth earphones from this brand. The case broke on the first pair due to a stupid mistake. Bought this pair because I knew the product was great. This model is a bit upgraded from my last pair. Sleaker and smaller design. The sound is great for the price. Cheap earphones can have a hollow or tinny sound. These don't. The sound can be a little muddled at times but it's not terribly distracting either. If you're looking for affordable earphones with great battery life and good sound, then these will definitely suit you. Also, phone calls are clear with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My first impression about this earbuds is that they are awesome! They seem like much more expensive earbuds. The sound great, fit great, and the case seems very well made. I love the LED screen on the front of it that shows that each earbud is charging and shows the total battery level of the case itself.They literally just arrived an hour ago, so these are my first impressions. I will update this review as necessary, but I have high hopes for these earbuds. They look great, feel great, and sound great out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great earbuds, for someone that needs to physically work and still jam. They stay attached, no issues, sound is great! Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, But Great Quality
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had these for three months now, and these have been working great so far. I listen to heavy metal, and these are loud…which is great for this genre.I workout with these almost everyday, and the battery lasts more than week easily. I’ve had headphones that cost me $100+ and these are better quality wise…and insanely cheap. I’m likely going to buy a second pair just in case I ever lose the first pair.
